page.title: 12Woodland (12)
page.content: There is{woodland}facing our school. The woodland can be found between{Park {Hill Rd and Nursery Rd.}It is lovely to have a wild area that is just like the countryside{2 miles}away from the {centre of Birmingham.}It is owned by the Calthorpe Estate and they take care of it. In the woods there are many types of {deciduous trees}eg.silver birch,ash, poplar,willow and oak. The other thing to make the wood beautiful is{wild {flowers}such as cow parsley,blue-bells buttercups,selfheal,nettles,ferns, dandelion,forget-me-not and ivy. There are many beautiful{insects and {butterflies. Three years ago(1982) there was a bad winter and some trees died and were felled. The Calthorpe Estate planted new saplings of sycamore and willow.
